Class com.code.aon.product.ProductCategory extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

id

java.lang.Integer id
Unique key.

name

java.lang.String name
Category name.

itemPattern

java.lang.String itemPattern
Shows the pattern of the product's complementary description. For example, if itemPattern is "%TALLA% %COLOR%" and the description of the product is "PANTALON LEVI'S", the description of the product will be "PANTALON LEVI'S" + "42 AZUL".
